document.full_text: with a win over denis istomin at the sony ericsson open, novak djokovic has the best start to a season by a male player since ivan lendl in 1986.
document.title: as djokovic extends unbeaten run, rivals are content to wait it out
lines_and_colors: with a win over denis istomin at the sony ericsson open, novak djokovic has the best start to a season by a male player since ivan lendl in 1986.
